original_text: Then, the king of Sodom, the king of Gomorrah, the king of Admah, the king of Zeboiim and the king of Bela (that is Zoar) went to fight. That was in the Valley of Siddim.
korean_text: 소돔 왕과 고모라 왕과 아드마 왕과 스보임 왕과 벨라 곧 소알 왕이 나와서 싯딤 골짜기에서 그들과 전쟁을 위하여 진을 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: Then, the king of Sodom went to fight
the king of Gomorrah went to fight
the king of Admah went to fight
the king of Zeboiim went to fight
and the king of Bela went to fight
That was in the Valley of Siddim
